00025 #ifndef __D3D9VIDEOMODE_H__
00026 #define __D3D9VIDEOMODE_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgreD3D9Prerequisites.h"
00029 #include "OgreString.h"
00030 
00031 #include "OgreNoMemoryMacros.h"
00032 #include <d3d9.h>
00033 #include "OgreMemoryMacros.h"
00034 
00035 namespace Ogre 
00036 {
00037     static unsigned int modeCount = 0;
00038 
00039     class D3D9VideoMode
00040     {
00041     private:
00042         D3DDISPLAYMODE mDisplayMode;
00043         unsigned int modeNumber;
00044 
00045     public:
00046         D3D9VideoMode() { modeNumber = ++modeCount; ZeroMemory( &mDisplayMode, sizeof(D3DDISPLAYMODE) ); }
00047         D3D9VideoMode( const D3D9VideoMode &ob ) { modeNumber = ++modeCount; mDisplayMode = ob.mDisplayMode; }
00048         D3D9VideoMode( D3DDISPLAYMODE d3ddm ) { modeNumber = ++modeCount; mDisplayMode = d3ddm; }
00049         ~D3D9VideoMode()
00050         {
00051             modeCount--;
00052         }
00053 
00054         unsigned int getWidth() const { return mDisplayMode.Width; }
00055         unsigned int getHeight() const { return mDisplayMode.Height; }
00056         D3DFORMAT getFormat() const { return mDisplayMode.Format; }
00057         unsigned int getRefreshRate() const { return mDisplayMode.RefreshRate; }
00058         unsigned int getColourDepth() const;
00059         D3DDISPLAYMODE getDisplayMode() const { return mDisplayMode; }
00060         void increaseRefreshRate(unsigned int rr) { mDisplayMode.RefreshRate = rr; } 
00061         String getDescription() const;
00062     };
00063 }
00064 #endif
